name: Horror Game (TransGame668)
description:
When you play this game, there's a maps that would help you to win, walking through the forest with fog, also no jumpscare in here. Just avoid the floating knife that will following you, find the yellow trophy to unlock the big wall and find the exit door for finishing the level.

Controls: Movement (WASD), Mouse (for looking around)

Credits: Horror Ambient Album by GWriterStudio [sky5X5, StarryNight, MoonShine]
